word_mean: 防腐剂，抗菌剂：抑制微生物生长发育而不一定杀灭微生物的物质。参见disinfectant和germicide

sentence.Network_en: Thyme tea can be used by adults for its antiseptic qualities.
sentence.Network_cn: 百里香茶的杀菌功效可用于成人。

sentence.Network_en: She bathed the cut with antiseptic.
These vegetables and herbs have strong antiseptic qualities.

entry.def: Antiseptic is a substance that kills germs and harmful bacteria.

example.ex: She bathed the cut with antiseptic.

entry.def: Something that is antiseptic kills germs and harmful bacteria.

example.ex: These vegetables and herbs have strong antiseptic qualities.
example.tran: 这些蔬菜和草本植物有很强的杀菌性。

means.word_mean: 1. a substance that destroys micro-organisms that carry disease without harming body tissues
1. thoroughly clean and free of or destructive to disease-causing organisms;

sentences.sentence: "it is said that marjoram has antiseptic qualities"

means.word_mean: 4. made free from live bacteria or other microorganisms;

auth_sentence.content: Our democracy doesn't demand machinelike, antiseptic perfection.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our democracy doesn't demand machinelike, antiseptic perfection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our democracy doesn't demand machinelike, antiseptic perfection.

auth_sentence.content: Waxed linoleum, dull green paint, an antiseptic smell.
auth_sentence.res_content: Waxed linoleum, dull green paint, an antiseptic smell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Waxed linoleum, dull green paint, an antiseptic smell.

auth_sentence.content: Not divine men, yet useful antiseptic products of their generation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not divine men, yet useful antiseptic products of their generation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not divine men, yet useful antiseptic products of their generation.

means.word_mean: 防腐的, 杀菌的，消毒的

sentences.en: Once an abscess has burst it should be bathed with antiseptic liquid.
sentences.cn: 脓包一破溃，就应该用消毒液清洗。

sentences.en: Put a little antiseptic cream on the grazed skin.
sentences.cn: 在擦伤的皮肤上塗点儿抗菌乳膏。

sentences.en: This antiseptic is for external use only.
They’re doing tests to evaluate the effectiveness of this herb as an antiseptic.
sentences.cn: 他们正在检测这种草药作为杀菌剂的有效性。

sentences.en: Antiseptic is used to sterilize the skin before giving an injection.
sentences.cn: 杀菌剂被用于在注射前给皮肤消毒。
